授業目的: This course examines aspects of contemporary Chinese society and culture from a global perspective. In additional to introducing students to recent developments in China, including “global China,” this course encourages students to explore the comparative and theoretical dimensions of cultural and social phenomena.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will gain knowledge of contemporary China as well as skills in the comparative analysis of social and culture issues.
特記事項:
この科目は、10/10（月）までの授業がオンデマンドで実施される科目です。
10/11（火）以降の授業は対面での実施が決定しました。本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course will be offered on-demand until 10/10（Mon.）.
Classes will be held in a face-to-face format from Monday, 10/11（Tue.） onward.
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Classes 1-3 will be available on demand. This course adopts the “reverse classroom” format. Each class will consist of mainly student presentations and in-class discussion.
